mapper.update: update mz_function set `action` = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logstate = #{logstate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `action`, code, createTime, deleted, description, `name`, parentid, `state`, logstate from mz_function where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `action`, code, createTime, deleted, description, `name`, parentid, `state`, logstate from mz_function
